title: Toss Me (6R11)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	While this card is stacked on a [Dwarven] condition, Gimli is strength +1. Fellowship: Place this card or another [Dwarven] card from hand on top of or beneath your draw deck.
Lore:	”'Don't tell the Elf.'”
Rarity:	R
